original_text: God sees deep inside us, and he knows our thoughts. He understands what is in the mind of his Spirit. When the Holy Spirit prays on behalf of God's people, he prays as God wants him to pray.
korean_text: 마음을 살피시는 이가 성령의 생각을 아시나니 이는 성령이 하나님의 뜻대로 성도를 위하여 간구하심이니라

sentences.original_text: He understands what is in the mind of his Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그의 영의 마음속에 있는 것을 이해하신다

sentences.original_text: When the Holy Spirit prays on behalf of God's people
sentences.korean_translation: 성령님이 하나님의 백성들을 위해 기도하실 때

sentences.original_text: he prays as God wants him to pray
